metadata.name: “Scary Garys 1 Year Anniversary Tee”
metadata.description:
Today marks the 1 year anniversary of the release of the “Scary Garys” digital collection. (02/08/2022) We are celebrating this amazing day with the “1 - year anniversary” t - shirt, designed by project founder Michael Hollingsworth (Goldie). You will have the option to redeem this NFT in the Modz upcoming world, allowing you to rock the t- shirt in the metaverse. You must own a Modz NFT and a Scary Garys NFT to access the wearable in their future metaverse.

Scary Garys on Opensea : https://opensea.io/collection/scary-garys  
The Modz on Opensea : https://opensea.io/collection/themodz
